elements.text: Welcome to Project Arrhythmia! Whether you're new to the game, modding or have been around for a while, I'm sure this documentation will help massively in understanding the ins and outs of the editor and the game as a whole.
These documents only list editor features and how to use them, everything else is listed in the Github wiki.
[VANILLA] represents a feature from original Legacy, with very minor tweaks done to it if any.
[MODDED] represents a feature added by BetterLegacy. These features will not work in unmodded PA.
[PATCHED] represents a feature modified by BetterLegacy. They're either in newer versions of PA or are partially modded, meaning they might not work in regular PA.
[ALPHA] represents a feature ported from alpha to BetterLegacy and are not present in Legacy.
[LEGACY] represents a Legacy feature that was discontinued in alpha.

documents.name: Credits
documents.desc: All the people who helped the mod development in some way.
